Edit.Name: prpVoiceClimbRate
Edit.Caption: Climb rate
Edit.Help: Enable voice read-back of the average climb rate when circling.

Edit.Name: prpVoiceTerrain
Edit.Caption: Terrain
Edit.Help: Enable warnings for final glide through terrain.

Edit.Name: prpVoiceWaypointDistance
Edit.Caption: Waypoint distance
Edit.Help: Enable voice read-back of the distance to next waypoint when in cruise mode.

Edit.Name: prpVoiceTaskAltitudeDifference
Edit.Caption: Task altitude difference
Edit.Help: Enable voice read-back of height above/below final glide when in final glide.

Edit.Name: prpVoiceMacCready
Edit.Caption: MacCready
Edit.Help: Enable voice read-back of MacReady setting after it is adjusted.

Edit.Name: prpVoiceNewWaypoint
Edit.Caption: New waypoint
Edit.Help: Enable voice announcement that the task waypoint has changed.

Edit.Name: prpVoiceInSector
Edit.Caption: In sector
Edit.Help: Enable voice announcement that the glider is within the task observation sector.

Edit.Name: prpVoiceAirspace
Edit.Caption: Airspace
Edit.Help: Enable voice warnings for airspace incursions.
